name: Flood Escape (Scribels)
description:
FLOOD ESCAPE

This is my 2D Platform Project: Flood Escape

Modifications:

1. Coded rising water that stops when the game is paused as a new obstacle for the player to escape from while trying to reach the objective point.

2. Two fully-fledged levels with different objectives and enemies for increasing difficulty for the player.

3. I've uploaded new textures for different tiles to create my own environment and aesthetic for the game.

4. I re-designed the main menu to fit the look of the rest of the game.
